page.title: 10PUNK - A FASHON TREND
page.content: {"PUNK"}HAS BEEN THE "IN" FASHION IN RECENT TIMES IN ALTRINCHAM. GIRL AND BOY PUNKS DRESS ALMOST ALIKE :_ BLACK LEATHER JACKETS, BLACK JUMPERS, STUDDED BELTS WORN AROUND WRISTS AND WAISTS,SPIKED NECKLETS ,DOC MARTENS OR BLACK STILLETO - HEELED SHOES. MAKE-UP IS VERY STRIKING WITH EYES BEING TOTALLY BLOCKED IN WITH DARK OR GARISH COLOURS, FACES PAINTED WHITE WITH VIVID SPLASHES OF COLOUR OR INTRICATE DESIGNS. THE MOST COMMON PUNK HAIRSTYLE IS SPIKED, MULTI-COLOURED AND STIFF. EARRINGS ARE WORN IN MULTIPLES, BY BOTH GIRLS AND BOYS. PUNKS LIKE THE MUDIC OF GROUPS SUCH AS {"MOTORHEAD"}AND {"CURE" PUNKS ARE RECOGNISED AS YOUNG PEOPLE REBELLING AGAINST PARENTAL AUTHORITY AND THE POLICE.
